    • Uses of HasContext in org.elasticsearch.action.count

      Classes in org.elasticsearch.action.count that implement HasContext 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CountRequest
      Deprecated. 
      use SearchRequest instead and set the size to 0
      class  CountResponse
      Deprecated. 
      use the search api with size 0 rather than the count api, namely SearchResponse instead.

    • Uses of HasContext in org.elasticsearch.action.exists

      Classes in org.elasticsearch.action.exists that implement HasContext 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ExistsRequest

      Deprecated.

      class  ShardExistsRequest
